testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: Then I change the Math App engine selection to "MapleNet (Math App)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "New Math App Question 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: When I choose "Math App" link from the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I choose a demo worksheet "DrawCircle" for the Math App question
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I enter the width to be "500" and the width units to be "percent"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: Then I assert that I am still on Math App question page and the width is invalid
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: And I click Cancel
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with invalid percentage of width

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create a new Math App question with valid percentage of width and preview it ?[90m# CreateMathAppQuestion.feature:31?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the question name as "?[0m?[32m?[1mNew Math App Question 1?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterQuestionName(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsideQuestionTextEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsertResponseAreaButton()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose "?[0m?[32m?[1mMath App?[0m?[32m" link from the dialog?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.chooseQuestionType(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI choose a demo worksheet "?[0m?[32m?[1mDrawCircle?[0m?[32m" for the Math App question?[0m ?[90m# MathAppQuestionSteps.selectMathAppDemoWorksheet(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI enter the width to be "?[0m?[32m?[1m100?[0m?[32m" and the width units to be "?[0m?[32m?[1mpercent?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# MathAppQuestionSteps.setMathAppWidthAndWidthUnit(String,String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click OK?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickResponseDialogOkButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the "?[0m?[32m?[1mMath App?[0m?[32m" Question Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionWidgetIsInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mAfter clicking Preview button I assert that the Math App question is rendered properly with "?[0m?[32m?[1m100.0%?[0m?[32m" width?[0m ?[90m# MathAppQuestionSteps.assertMathAppWidthCorrectOnRendering(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI close the question preview window?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.closeQuestionPreviewWindow()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the question designer Save & Close button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickSaveAndCloseButton()?[0m
